item.title: CVE-2024-24834|2024-02-08T13:13:18.112Z -- realmag777 -- BEAR – Bulk Editor and Products Manager Professional for WooCommerce by Pluginus.Net
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in realmag777 BEAR – Bulk Editor and Products Manager Professional for WooCommerce by Pluginus.Net allows Stored XSS.This issue affects BEAR – Bulk Editor and Products Manager Professional for WooCommerce by Pluginus.Net: from n/a through 1.1.4.
